Thursday, August 3, 2006

RubyConf sold out!

Posted by josh

Registration for RubyConf 2006 is closed. It took only about four hours to fill 200-some seats. Is that some kind of record?

If you missed out, consider holding your own. Ruby Central is offering grants to help fund regional events.
